abstract: Dozens of LOT Airlines flights are grounded for hours, leaving thousands of passengers stranded in Warsaw's Chopin Airport; Polish airline attributes groundings to computer attack by unidentified culprits, and, if confirmed, would mark first time flights have been canceled or delayed because of hacking.
lead_paragraph: If confirmed, the attack would be one of the first instances in which flights were canceled or delayed because of a malicious hacking.

headline.main: Hacking Grounds Flights of Poland’s National Airline
headline.print_headline: A Hacking Grounds Flights of Poland’s National Airline

snippet: If confirmed, the attack would be one of the first instances in which flights were canceled or delayed because of a malicious hacking.
